( SELECT
pk_terms AS "pk" , fk_cp_code AS "cpCode" , fk_terms_code AS "termsCode" , fd_admin_name AS "adminName" , fd_terms_title AS "title" , fd_terms_contents AS "termsContents" , fd_terms_mandatory_yn AS "mandatoryYN" , fd_terms_ver AS "termsVer" , fd_writer_id AS "writerId" , TO_CHAR(fd_regdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS "regDate"
FROM tb_terms AS n LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT pk_admin_id, fd_admin_name FROM tb_admin) AS a ON n.fd_writer_id = a.pk_admin_id
WHERE n.fk_cp_code IN (SELECT fk_cp_code FROM tb_admin_svc WHERE fk_admin_id = #{id})
) AS terms
